lead_paragraph: PELTZ--Leon, M.D.,81, died January 8 at home in Sag Harbor, N.Y. Private practitioner, Manhattan, 1968-2002; consultant for Time Inc. and Coltec Industries. He graduated from Cornell, served in the Air Force, earned his doctorate at SUNY Downstate, and trained at St. Vincent's Hospital. He leaves his wife of 57 years, Barbara Loreto, and their daughter, Jennifer. 1/3
